mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guest_book (author_email, author_nickname, recipient_email, recipient_nickname, message, modifiedAt, createdAt) VALUES (#{author_email}, #{author_nickname}, #{recipient_email}, #{recipient_nickname}, #{message}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE guest_book SET message = #{message}, modifiedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, author_email, author_nickname, recipient_email, recipient_nickname, message, modifiedAt, createdAt FROM guest_book WHERE recipient_email = #{email} ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5
